snippet: Live Nation and SFX Entertainment, two companies among the biggest players in live music, are said to be interested in buying Insomniac Events, the biggest promoter of electronic dance music in the country.
abstract: Live Nation and SFX Entertainment, two companies among the biggest players in live music, are said to be interested in buying Insomniac Events, the biggest promoter of electronic dance music in the country.

headline.main: Big Music Companies Are Said to Pursue a Top Dance Promoter
